definition[0]: if different people or organizations unite, or if something unites them, they join together in order to achieve something
example[0]: Our goal is to unite the opposition parties and defeat the president.
example[1]: Party members united behind their leader.
example[2]: In 1960, the regions united to form the Somali Republic.
definition[1]: the largest trade union in the United Kingdom, with over two million members in the public and private sectors. It was formed in 2007 by the merger (=joining together) of two trade unions (Amicus and the Transport and General Workersâ€™ Union).
